title: American Made: Nvidia Bets Big on Intel with $5 Billion Investment to Drive AI and PC Innovation
description: AI powerhouse Nvidia has announced a $5 billion investment in Intel, marking a strategic partnership aimed at accelerating advancements in artificial intelligence and personal computing. Intel shares have surged almost 24 percent at market open in response.

title: Harvard psychologist reveals careers leading to higher suicide risk. Check full list
description: A Harvard psychologist has warned that occupations with ready access to lethal means show higher suicide risk, especially for women. He has also cautioned that artificial intelligence brings both promise and serious pitfalls for mental-health care.
content: "In the US, about 15 percent of people think about suicide. One third of people who ever think about suicide will ever make a suicide attempt. Those who attempt and survive, so one in five will make another attempt. For those people who have attempte... [2786 chars]

title: Meta Launches Next-Generation Smart Glasses With Built-In Display And AI Features
description: Meta chief executive Mark Zuckerberg has launched the company’s latest wearable technology, a new pair of Ray-Ban smart glasses featuring a miniature display and artificial intelligence capabilities, during an event on Sept. 17. According to CNN, the Meta Ray-Bans Display glasses aim to reduce dependence on traditional phone screens, allowing wearers to interact directly with Meta’s AI tools and their digital content through a device that looks much like everyday spectacles or sunglasses.
content: Meta chief executive Mark Zuckerberg has launched the company’s latest wearable technology, a new pair of Ray-Ban smart glasses featuring a miniature display and artificial intelligence capabilities. The Meta Ray-Ban Display glasses were launched at ... [2850 chars]
